components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Outbound SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple MTN Networks

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN Nigeria. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Azercell Network in Azerbaijan

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Azercell Network in Azerbaijan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Azercell Network in Azerbaijan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Some Twilio Blog Content not Displaying

incident_updates.body: Twilio blog content is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Documentation

incident_updates.body: Twilio blog content is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Documentation

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing the blog content to not display the full content and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Documentation

incident_updates.body: We are investigating an issue where the full content is not displaying in Twilio blog posts. Our engineering team has been alerted and are actively investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Documentation

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with code blocks in the Twilio blog. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Etisalat Network in Afghanistan

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays and are observing SMS delivery failures as well when sending messages to Etisalat Network in Afghanistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
12 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 12 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
17 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 17 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
19 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 19 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
24 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 24 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
26 May 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 May 2023 at 17:00 PDT
